## Instructions

This module exercise is a series of questions **posted on Blackboard** that check your understanding of the material contained in the [week 1 lecture videos][week01-lectures].
You can go directly to the module exercise on Blackboard by [clicking here][blackboard-module-exercises01].
This should be completed **after** you have finished watching the lecture videos.

::::: {.callout .primary}
There is no time limit and you may attempt the module exercises up to three times.
Your grade will be the highest score you receive across your attempts.
:::::
